features: 【Essential car replacement parts】：If your car windshield washer nozzle is not spraying so smoothly, please check if the internal hose and nozzle are aging, our product will be your perfect replacement to reconnect the car water pump with the nozzle to smooth spraying of the glass washer,make your driving vision clear.

【Package include】:1 x 4M/13.13FT windshield washer hose, 3 x windshield wiper hose connectors (1 x T type; 1 x Y type; 1 x I type),2 x windshield washer nozzles,2 x gaskets,10 x hood insulation holders,1 x plastic fastener removal .The ideal kit contains everything you need!

【High quality】:Our windshield washer fluid hoses are made of AAA grade rubber, a material that can withstand high and low temperatures and remains soft and flexible at any temperature. It does not easily deform even when pulled up at will. And the sturdy and durable nature of the connector greatly improve the usage time.

【Easy use】:The kit comes with 3 types of converter connectors for various installation angles, ensure stable installation even at right angles position.The unique tip design of the plastic fastener removal tool makes it easy to remove clips that break off during plastic windshield fluid injector replacement

【Applycations】:Our Windshield Washer Nozzles are different from other nozzle,our water nozzle sprays a full fan-shaped mist spray so that the water sprayed out of the front windshield coverage more greatly,cleaning effect,replacement OEM: 4805742AB,5116079AA, 5113049AA, 5303833AA, 55077460AA and 5160308AA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was so worth the money excellent quality ! I do recommend this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Installation went much better than I had thought. Upon completion, a few parts were not required. My 2015 1500 Big Horn required one tee fitting and about half of the tubing in addition to the spray nozzles of course. The original tubing made a connection at the hood hinge area. That is where the new tubing was attached to the old. The old tubing had a barbed end, so attaching the new tube was easy. Removal of the old spray nozzles was easy because they broke apart as I attempted to remove with needle nose pliers. The most difficult task was removing the blanket anchors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works well.
reviews.reviewText: Product works well all around. With a little extra work I could make it fit my vehicle, even though it's supposed to fit my vehicle (per Amazon), and it sprays really strong. The only thing to note is that it sprays more of a stream and not a fan. With a little jb weld or something you can shape the hole to make the spray pattern work however you need. Even without modification the stream splashes onto the rest of the windshield and does a good job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the tools with it
reviews.reviewText: This had everything I needed. It didn't fit my truck but I kept it anyway for the tools and extra stuff in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The angle of the nozzle was pretty low spraying onto the window. You dont actually get that middle spraying. Not to mention one nozzle came defective seemed pretty flimsy with the plastic. Its good for a quick fix. Ill be getting oem ones for future. Ended up using only one instead of using the pair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the price. Fit my 2013 Ram 1500 and it came with lots of extras. The nozzles work great although I will say they did spray further down than I would have liked and they're not adjustable. The hose that it came with is really flexible which I really liked. I wish an L shaped connector would have been included as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Seals were not sealed
reviews.reviewText: Package arrived and when I went to install one of the sprayers fell apart. Looked at the adhesive pattern and only a small amount was applied. I used some super glue and glued it. After I assembled the kit on the car and attempted to use the system the second one fell apart. Same issue. Glued that one. It’s not a fan type sprayer either it’s a focused on one area kind of spray pattern. If your looking for a cheap fix that you’ll have to maintain this may be your product, but I would not recommend. After a week the drivers side stopped spraying. I haven’t had the time or energy to investigate. Planning to buy an OEM replacement kit to replace this cheap knock off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
